title: Crime and Drama Music Pack 3
description: This is a music pack featuring eighteen unique ambient/orchestral/horror instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present the Crime and Drama Music Pack 3! This is an asset pack that contains eighteen orchestral/ambient fusion instrumentals geared towards the world of crime, drama, and horror. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.

Â 

The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:

Analysis - Ambient - 80s - D Minor - 70 BPM

Dark Ambient - 100BPM - Dm - The Caverns

Compromised Databases - D Minor - 70 BPM

Crime Photo - F Minor 80 BPM

End Boss - F Minor - 99 BPM

Haunted Hills - F Minor - 70 BPM

Heroes Assemble - 80BPM

Lurk - A Minor - 60 BPM

Mainframe Compromise - D Minor - 70 BPM

EKG - --130 - BPM - --E - Minor

Rally Point Extraction - A Minor - 65 BPM

Scanning Checkpoint - D Minor - 70 BPM

The 3rd Law - D Minor - 70 BPM

The Detective - Eb Minor - 70 BPM

The Discovery - D Minor - 70 BPM

The Future Is Here Artificial - Intelligence 120BPM G Minor

The Retribution - Sci - Fi - D Minor - 70 BPM

The Shadows On The Wall - B Minor - 70 BPM


Audio Preview:
technicalDetails:
